title: FPS lag or is my computer dead now
body: Hey, guys, I don't know if this happens to any of yall. But when I'm in a game, the game starts slowing down every time I click a place it'll take like 4 sec to response. Even if my Ping is 20-30, and my FPS is going over 100 FPS yet somehow my game is still slowing any thoughts or answer for this problem.{{champion:58}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3077}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body:
Check your HDD/SSD it could be overheating, or the dust inside your computer might be clogging it

Or, looking from a file perspective, the drive could be  full of unnecessary files, which might be causing it to slow down the drive may also be damaged in some way (Age, Damage, Poor wiring etc.)

I had to move league from my G Drive (500gb, HDD) to my C Drive (720gb SSD) because of this kind of problem, now the only lag i get is Ping related

If all else fails, a fresh install usually works, if the problem persists, then you might want to send a ticket to riot support
